errors.401: Unauthorized, maybe invalid email or password.

deposit.title: Deposit
deposit.support_btc: This address only supports BTC and Omni USDT.
deposit.support_eos: This address supports all base on EOS tokens, such as EOS, IQ, BLACK, OCT, KARMA, etc.
deposit.support_eth: This address supports all ERC 20 tokens, such as ETH, XIN, TUSD, HT, LOOM, LEO, etc.
deposit.support_trx: This address supports all TRC 10 and TRC 20 tokens, such as TRX, BTT, USDT-TRON, etc.
deposit.both: Notice: Both an Address and a Memo are required to successfully deposit your %{symbol} to Mixin Wallet.
deposit.confirmations: Deposit will arrive after at least %{confirmations} block confirmations.

wallet.title: My Mixin Wallet (Beta)

import.title: Import Wallet
import.key: Input the private key of the wallet

wallet.tips: Mixin Wallet is a Mixin Network-based full set cryptocurrency wallet that securely manages your digital assets with a private key and a 6-digit PIN code. Please note that we will not save your private key and digital PIN code, once the private key and PIN code lost, both of them cannot be recovered, please keep the private key and remember the 6-digit PIN code carefully.
